title: NFL Draft: Top 10 Running Back Prospects with Josh Edwards (Football 4/8)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports draft expert Josh Edwards to continue offensive prospect rankings week on the Pick Six podcast, with a focus on the Top 10 running backs in this year's class. Josh says his top back resembles Dalvin Cook and several others were names you heard in Heisman Trophy consideration. Get prepped on 2020 RBs as the guys dissect their playing style, draft range and potential team fits.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @edwardsCBS
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en

itunes:subtitle: There's not much separation among this draft class' elite running backs but Josh Edwards joins Will Brinson to try and distinguish his Top 10 prospects.
